content: *bring the holiday spirit into your home with this charming cross stitch stockings yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** bernat® super value™ 197 g/7 oz 389 m/426 yds *version i snowman * * main color mc forest green 53243 *1 ball* * contrast a cherry red 53436 *1 ball* * contrast b winter white 07407 *1 ball* * contrast c black 07421 *1 ball* *version ii santa * * main color mc teal heather 53203 *1 ball* * contrast a oatmeal 53010 *1 ball* * contrast b cherry red 53436 *1 ball* * contrast c winter white 07407 *1 ball* * contrast d black 07421 *1 ball* *version iii tree * * main color mc oatmeal 53010 *1 ball* * contrast a taupe 53012 *1 ball* * contrast b forest green 53243 *1 ball* * contrast c cherry red 53436 *1 ball* *additional materials * * stitch marker * embroidery needle see also bernat softee chunky version super bulky weight cross stitch stockings super bulky 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cross-stitch-stockings-super-bulky
